authors: A collection derived from the web community (Reddit,Pinterest,DmsGuild,ecc.). For credits, authors are provided with a web link in the entity description

monster.name: Queen of the Wisp

trait.name: Consume Life
entries: As a bonus action, the Queen of the Wisp can target one creature it can see within 15 ft. of it that has 15 hit points and is still alive. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw against this magic or die. If the target dies, the Queen of the Wisp regains 10 ({@dice 3d6}) hit points.

trait.name: Variable Illumination
entries: The will-o'-wisp sheds bright light in a 5 to 40 ft. radius and dim light for an additional number of ft. equal to the chosen radius. The will-o'-wisp can alter the radius as a bonus action.

action.name: Bright Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) radiant damage.

action.name: Wisp's Fire
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d8}) radiant damage.

action.name: Invisibility
entries: The Queen of the Wisp and its light magically become {@condition invisible} until it attacks or uses its Consume Life, or until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell).

legendaryHeader: The Queen of the Wisp can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Queen of the Wisp regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary.name: Light Swipe
entries: The Queen of the Wisp makes one Bright Sword attack

legendary.name: Blinding Light (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Each creature in a 20 ft. radius sphere centered on The Queen of the Wisp must make a Dexterity saving throw. A target takes {@damage 4d6} radiant damage and is {@condition blinded} for a minute, on a successful save the target only takes half as much damage and is not {@condition blinded}.

legendary.name: Light in the fog (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The Queen of the Wisp targets one creature that can see and hear it. The creature makes a Wisdom saving throw ({@dc 12}). If it fails the saving throw, it is {@condition charmed} by the Queen of the Wisp for a minute. The {@condition charmed} creature acts to defend the Queen of the Wisp against all threats. The target can reroll the saving throw at the end of their turns.
